personalInfo.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with 5+ years building scalable web applications. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud architectures. Passionate about creating user-friendly interfaces and optimizing performance.

description: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ daily active users
Reduced API response time by 40% through database optimization and caching strategies
Mentored team of 5 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Built responsive web application using React and Node.js from ground up
Integrated third-party APIs including Stripe, SendGrid, and AWS S3
Collaborated with product team to design and implement new features

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Scalable e-commerce platform with payment integration
